Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [telegram] <emmanux> KMD does not "stake", you only need to access your funds once a month, and claim the monthly reward. That's it. (re @MeiMeiU: While I'm having this issue, are the coins in my wallet still staking?)

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [telegram] <MeiMeiU> OK. Thank you for the clarification. Will I lose the reward if I don't claim it monthly?

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [telegram] <emmanux> Yes. at least once a month, you need to make a transaction or claim your reward. (re @MeiMeiU: OK. Thank you for the clarification. Will I lose the reward if I don't claim it monthly?)

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [telegram] <emmanux> Komodo rewards active users.
